channel.title: 508 client
channel.description:
Alright guys.. I need answers and i need them now... Everything works great... But Listen to this
I have a computer in my computer room. It is a HP desktop computer with Windows Vista. I run a 508 server there because it ONLY works there for some darn reason... Now, Right now, I'm using a dell computer in my bedroom with Windows XP, and none of the 508, servers and clients does not work!>!>!!. Here are the list of 508 clients I tried to use. [quote]Blazescape, Batmanscape, Runewarz, Server 508 a.k.a. Epeoson , and maybe two more...[/quote] But for some reason they all have an exception in the thread 'main' java.lang or something like that... But the same thing happens with clients.. I have tried these clients so far [quote]Runewarz, 508 HD client, Joshes 508 ip changer...[/quote] I need help on how to fix this error...
Also, the 508 source I am using for windows vista is zooscape, But there client is not ip changeable.. Please people I need a client that will work for my computer!!! Or maybe suggest any 317 servers AND clients..And yes I have downloaded the newest java and changed the java in run.bat. Thank you very much a.k.a TYVM Please Help
